question.question: Which of the following is a characteristic sign of thoracic distension in the context of hypersensitivity and respiratory allergies?
question.option_a: Increased opacity of the lung fields with elevated diaphragmatic cupolas
question.option_b: Hyperclarity of the lung fields with flattening of the diaphragmatic cupolas and horizontalization of the ribs
question.option_c: Narrowing of the lung fields with elevated diaphragmatic cupolas
question.option_d: Increased opacity of the lung fields with horizontalization of the ribs
